name: no ONE (itch)
description:
In a dystopian future, where overpopulation is massive, an employee tries to treat and heal sick people in a massive healing factory.

The employee has one minute for each patient. If he can't save them in that timespam, The State will get rid of them - they can't spend more resources on sick people.

Mix strange substances that change the vital constants of the patients in order to keep them alive. Secure your job.

no ONE was made for Global Game Jam 2016 by Team Gotham:

Credits:
